snippet: Faced with discrimination, a pilot and her children move to Ethiopia on the eve of Mussolini’s invasion.
abstract: Benjamin Alire Saenz reviews children's book Black Dove White Raven by Elizabeth Wein.
lead_paragraph: Faced with discrimination, a pilot and her children move to Ethiopia on the eve of Mussolini’s invasion.

headline.main: ‘Black Dove White Raven,’ by Elizabeth Wein
